Class StorageManager

java.lang.Object
StorageManager
public class StorageManager extends Object
The StorageManager Class handles reading and writing user budget information to and from saved files.

  • Method Details

    • loadUserData

      public void loadUserData(String username, int year)
      Loads the user data from saved file.
      Parameters:
      username - the name of the user whose data is being loaded
      year - the year the data is being loaded for

    • saveUserData

      public void saveUserData(String username, int year)
      Saves the current user data to a file.
      Parameters:
      username - the name of the user whose data is being saved
      year - the year the data is being saved for

    • deleteUserData

      public void deleteUserData(String username, int year)
      Deletes the user Data from file.
      Parameters:
      username - the name of the user whose data is being deleted
      year - the year the data is being deleted

    • listAvailableYears

      public void listAvailableYears(String username)
      Lists all the years for which the data is available for a user.
      Parameters:
      username - the name of the user whose data is being accessed

    • updateUserBudget

      public void updateUserBudget(String username, int year, Object budgetData)
      Updates the users budget for a given year.
      Parameters:
      username - the name of the user whose data is being accessed
      year - the year the data is being updated for
      budgetData - the updated budget information

    • getUserBudget

      public Budget getUserBudget(String username, int year)
      Get the budget for a given user on a given year.
      Parameters:
      username - the name of the user whose data is being accessed
      year - the year the data is being accessed
      Returns:
      The Budget object with all the budget information for the specified year
